Headline: Late Austria goals deny North Macedonia dream debut, Latest Football News - The New Paper
Text: Austria defeated North Macedonia 3-1 in their Euro 2020 Group C opener in Bucharest this morning (Singapore time).Stefan Lainer gave the Austrians the lead in the 18th minute (left), but Goran Pandev levelled 10 minutes later in North Macedonia's first match at a major tournament as an independent nation.Second-half goals from substitutes Michael Gregoritsch and Marko Arnautovic then secured the win for Austria.Get The New Paper on your phone with the free TNP app. Download from the Apple App StoreÂ or Google Play Store now
